name: Luminos Prism 34" OLED Ultrawide
description: Premium 34-inch OLED ultrawide with 175Hz refresh rate and 3440x1440 resolution. Features integrated ambient lighting, USB-C 96W charging, and AI-optimized color profiles.

reviews.review_text: OLED ultrawide is the perfect format. Immersive and practical.
Ambient lighting matches screen content. Beautiful.
New brand but quality rivals established players.
